::: {.callout-note title="Live Execution" appearance="simple"}
All code in this post is rendered against a Databricks workspace before publication.

## Summary

- This is a template for posts that execute Python code against a remote Databricks cluster
- Replace this content with your own tutorial or tip

## Demo

::: {#60671f3d .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
spark.sql("SELECT current_catalog(), current_database()").show()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
+-----------------+----------------+
|current_catalog()|current_schema()|
+-----------------+----------------+
|   hive_metastore|         default|
+-----------------+----------------+

```
:::
